channel.title: Search problems.
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Search problems." - You might not be able to search properly if you use NoScript.

item.title: Re: Search problems.
item.content:encoded:
I just managed to fix it and recreate it. The culprit is Firefox's NoScript add-on.

When the wiki is in it's white list the "Search this Wiki" text disappears from the search box. That's it's normal behavior.

When NoScript is blocking it the text doesn't go away. It'll cause the error.

item.title: Re: Search problems.
item.content:encoded: When I searched for a Nightshade from bvswiki.com's search box, the page came up just fine. However, I'll experiment more with it when I get home to see if I can reproduce the problem.

item.title: Search problems.
item.content:encoded:
Right, this came up when I used http://bvswiki.com to get here.

I searched for 'Nightshade'. I got this page: http://bvswiki.com/dummy?query=Nightshade&search=search with the text "The page dummy you want to access does not exist." on it.

It works perfectly on http://bvs.wikidot.com. The search on that url will lead to this. http://bvs.wikidot.com/search:site/q/Nightshade
